description:
According to SlashData’s findings, the JavaScript community grew by an impressive four million users in the past 12 months, solidifying its status as the most widely-used programming language globally. Here is a breakdown of the size of various programming language communities: While JavaScript remains the leader, the report highlights the remarkable growth of the Rust... Read more »

The post SlashData: Rust sees fastest growth, JavaScript still dominates appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: SlashData: Rust sees fastest growth, JavaScript still dominates
